name: Overload Cloak
desc: An excentric solution to overload is to execute entropy reversal in p-space. This has also a side effect to reverse aging and destructively affect some cognitive processes. Banned in most systems.

name: Reflector Shield
desc: "A sophisticated shield matrix that can deflect incoming projectiles. The system exerts an intense force to reject enemy fire, resulting in taking an extra %s the normal flux damage."
short: Reflects projectiles back at attackers but takes double flux damage
